殷商.definition: final name of the Shang dynasty after their move to Yinxu 殷墟 in modern Henan province

殷墟.definition: Yinxu, ruins of Yinshang 殷商 city at Anyang 安陽|安阳 in Henan province, a World Heritage site

殷弘緒.definition: François Xavier d'Entrecolles (1664-1741), French Jesuit missionary to Kangxi court

殷憂啟聖.definition: deep suffering can lead to enlightenment (idiom); storms make oaks take deeper root

殷都.definition: Yindu district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan

殷都區.definition: Yindu district of Anyang city 安陽市|安阳市[An1 yang2 shi4], Henan
